author: Dan Gallagher
title: Qualcomm: In the Market for Fresh Perspective
text:
Can Qualcomm Inc. break from its past without endangering its future?
That should be the key question on the minds of the chipmakerâ€™s board of directors in the wake of its close call. The company was nearly picked off by Broadcom through an unsolicited takeover offer that essentially was vetoed by President Donald Trump in the name of national security earlier this week.
